column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I have taken this medication for over 25 years and have allways gotten wonderful results for my chronic back and neck pain.

column2: Colt, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was taking this medication and all the sudden my speach started to slow down and within the 2nd day I could not talk at all. Could not believe that a med could do that to someone.

column2: P Andrews, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I have used this medication in the past and it relieved my pain in no time.  I have recently had muscle spasms in my neck twice and the doctor prescribed another medication that took over a week to relieve my pain.  Have they stopped making Norgesic Forte?  If they have, I really wish they would put it back on the market.  Nothing works like Norgesic Forte.

column2: 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I have taken this drug as needed for over 25 years and it is the only effective drug I have used to stop muscle spasm and pain.  I also am unable to get my prescription refilled because the pharmacy says that it is no longer available.  Does anyone know where I can get it?

column2: 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I have been taking this drug for several years and now I cannot get it. I want to know why.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was prescribed this for migraines. While it got rid of my headache asap, it left me extremely drowsy, which sort of defeated the point since I was still unable to focus at work.

column2: locrutch, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: this is a great drug for anyone with very painfull back problems....just not sure why you cant lay down for 30 minutes after taking..

column2: Norgesic Forte Oral, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
Mac, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I was prescibed this to take whenever I got a cluster headache. My cluster headaches (when left untreated) were causing severe migraines. Norgesic Forte helped me get the cluster headaches under control and eliminated my migraines. Walgreens told me that this was taken off the market, my dr. switched me to something else and it is not effective in eliminating my migraines. I can find no information on Norgesic Forte being taken off the market. Hopefully I can get put back on it because it is the only thing that works for my headaches!

column2: 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I have had back problems for 25+ years. This seems to work overnight. Have been using now and then for the same number of years with ibuprofen. BUT TALK TO YOUR DR. FIRST... I have been told by Dr. that if you alternate Aceaminophen and Ibuprofen it intensifies the effects. BUT TALK TO YOUR DR. FIRST....

column2: Yodaboo, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I take this for muscle tension headaches that are very painful. Usually works in 20 minutes and I feel great without any side effects. Let's me continue on with my day. I have used occasionally for 25 years.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: Go to work quickly and eases the muscle spasm under my shoulder blades.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Only problem is that the cafeine in it makes it hard for me to fall asleep.  Otherwise. it has been helpful.

column2: rjh, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I had some minor stomach upset the first few times I took it, but it seems to help better than anything else I've tried.

column2: sasie, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I had taken this before and had no problems and my pain and swelling went away or eased up! I would tell everybody go ahead and try it it does work on most of us, I have PD and it seems to help me with no problems.
I take this for migraines... and if caught in time it works very well.

column2: Zanini, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Just takes the top off the pain.  My pain never goes away.  I am wondering if I can take ibuprophen with it.

column2: tinawat71, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was put on this medicine for knee pain. It gave me severe diarrhea.I have only been on it 4 days and 3 of them, I had to stay close to the restroom.Sometimes too late! So, I suggest if you take this and have diarrhes the next day, go ahead and call your doctor back and let him know.....I'm calling first thing in the morning!!
